alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene; Owen; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 26 at 12:27AM EDT until August 26 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL CLAY...WESTERN OWEN...NORTH CENTRAL GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 1227 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brazil to 9 miles northwest of Spencer to 10 miles northeast of Linton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cagles Mill Lake and Freedom around 1230 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Spencer. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 25 and 35. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
